title: Tekkit模组生存-part22-Computercraft教程4-if选择结构
author: communicationDC
txt_content:
http://player.youku.com/player.php/sid/XODI2Mzk5MDI0/v.swf

ComputerCraft模组编程课
这一节介绍的是if选择结构
下面是goforward的源代码：
if turtle.forward() then
  print("Moving Forward!")
else
  print("Suck-Mining")
  turtle.dig()
  turlte.forward()
end
做好笔记哦！
